com.compendium.ui.plaf
Class LineUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      com.compendium.ui.plaf.LineUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinkUI
public class LineUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

The class which is the base class for handles the drawing of lines.

drawArrow

protected void drawArrow(java.awt.Graphics g,
                         java.awt.Point a,
                         java.awt.Point b,
                         int width)
Draws a one arrow at the end of the line. The line is given by two points. The arrow is given by its width.

Parameters:
g, - the Graphics object to use for drawing.
a, - one end pf the line.
b, - the other end of the line.
width, - the width of the arrow head to draw.
